path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - DefiHorse Vesting - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: Unnecessary usage of SafeMath library in Solidity 0.8.0+
findings.description: The contract uses SafeMath library for overflow checking which is already done by default in Solidity 0.8.0+, and only used to have a custom revert message.
